settings_conflictaction_smart_conflict_d:
This is a PRO feature. You need a Cloud Sync online account. (Go to PRO settings for details.)

  • For small markdown files, the plugin tries to merge them with diff3 algorithm.
  • For large files or non-markdown files, the plugin saves both files by renaming them.

Please manually back up your vault before using this feature.

modal_onedrivefullauth_shortdesc:
Currently only OneDrive for personal is supported. OneDrive for Business is NOT supported (yet).
Visit the address in a browser, and follow the steps.
Finally you should be redirected to Obsidian.
modal_onedrivefullauth_shortdesc_linux: It seems that you are using Obsidian on Linux, and you might not be able to jump back here properly. Please consider using the flatpack version of Obsidian, or creating an obsidian.desktop file.
modal_onedrivefullauth_copybutton: Click to copy the auth url
modal_onedrivefullauth_copynotice: The auth url is copied to the clipboard!
modal_onedrivefullrevokeauth_step1: Step 1: Go to the following address, click the "Edit" button for the plugin, then click "Remove these permissions" button on the page.
modal_onedrivefullrevokeauth_step2: Step 2: Click the button below, to clean the locally-saved login credentials.
modal_onedrivefullrevokeauth_clean_desc: You need to click the button.
modal_googledriveauth_tutorial: Please firstly go to the address, then go on the auth flow. In the end, you will see a code, please paste that code here and submit.

modal_remoteprefix_azureblobstorage_titl: You are changing the remote prefix config
modal_remoteprefix_azureblobstorage_shor:
1. The plugin would NOT automatically move the content from the old directory to the new one directly on the remote. Everything syncs from the beginning again.
2. If you set the string to the empty, the prefix will be the vault name.
3. The remote directory name itself would not be encrypted even you've set an E2E password.
4. Some special char like '?', '/', '\' are not allowed. Spaces in the beginning or in the end are also trimmed.
modal_remoteprefix_azureblobstorage_inva: Your input contains special characters like '?', '/', '\' which are not allowed.

modal_cleardupfiles_warning: Warning: The plugin just stupidly finds all the file names that looks like duplicated files (.dup in file names). Also, this only deletes local files, so you need to trigger a sync to delete remote files.
modal_cleardupfiles_warning_finished: All the detected duplicated files are removed!

settings_cleardupfiles_desc: Smart Conflict may create `.dup` files. If you are sure they are no longer needed, remove all local duplicates.
settings_pro_tutorial:
Cloud Sync basic features are free and do not require an account.

PRO features require a paid Cloud Sync online account.

First, sign up/sign in at remotelysave.com. Then connect this plugin to that account.
settings_pro_revoke_desc: You've connected as user {{email}}. If you want to disconnect, click this button.
settings_pro_intro_desc: Open the website to sign up or sign in.
settings_pro_auth_desc: After signing in on the website, connect this plugin to your online account.
